name: Boom Kitty
description:
Boom Kitty is a 2D top down shooter inspired by Hotline Miami. Many hours of work have gone into this Unity powered game. We at powered by Unity feel that the tools provided by the Unity engine enable anyone to make a hit indie game such as this. 

If you feel discouraged just load up a copy of Boom Kitty and pretend that the enemies are your haters. Anyone who says bad things about you is simply a hater. Do not listen. No critical thinking or self refection should ever come into your heart and mind. 

You know what should be on your heart, mind, and hard drive? Boom Kitty. Why? It's made with Unity. What else could you possibly need to know. 

-----
